scripts.backend-build: tsc -p src/backend && webpack --config backend-webpack.config.js && webpack --config serverAdmin-webpack.config.js && npm run build-after-copy-overrides-config
scripts.backend-build-and-serve-dev: npm run backend-build && npm run backend-serve-dev
scripts.build-dev: npm run build-dev-de && npm run build-dev-en && npm run build-after-copy-overrides-dist-dev
scripts.build-dev-de: ng build --base-href=/mytbdev/de/ --target=production --environment=dev --aot true --app=frontend --output-path dist/static/mytbdev/de --locale de --i18n-format xlf --i18n-file src/frontend/locales/messages.de.xlf
scripts.build-dev-en: ng build --base-href=/mytbdev/en/ --target=production --environment=dev --aot true --app=frontend --output-path dist/static/mytbdev/en --locale en --i18n-format xlf --i18n-file src/frontend/locales/messages.en.xlf
scripts.build-beta: npm run build-beta-de && npm run build-beta-en && npm run build-after-copy-overrides-dist-dev
scripts.build-beta-de: ng build --base-href=/mytbbeta/de/ --target=production --environment=beta --aot true --app=frontend --output-path dist/static/mytbbeta/de --locale de --i18n-format xlf --i18n-file src/frontend/locales/messages.de.xlf
scripts.build-beta-en: ng build --base-href=/mytbbeta/en/ --target=production --environment=beta --aot true --app=frontend --output-path dist/static/mytbbeta/en --locale en --i18n-format xlf --i18n-file src/frontend/locales/messages.en.xlf
scripts.build-prod: npm run build-prod-de && npm run build-prod-en && npm run build-after-copy-overrides-dist-dev
scripts.build-prod-de: ng build --base-href=/mytb/de/ --target=production --environment=prod --aot true --app=frontend --output-path dist/static/mytb/de --locale de --i18n-format xlf --i18n-file src/frontend/locales/messages.de.xlf
scripts.build-prod-en: ng build --base-href=/mytb/en/ --target=production --environment=prod --aot true --app=frontend --output-path dist/static/mytb/en --locale en --i18n-format xlf --i18n-file src/frontend/locales/messages.en.xlf
scripts.frontendserver-build-dev-de: ng build --base-href=/mytbdev/de/ --environment=dev --aot true --preserve-symlinks true--app=server --output-path dist/mytbdev-server/de --locale de --i18n-format xlf --i18n-file src/frontend/locales/messages.de.xlf
scripts.frontendserver-build-beta-de: ng build --base-href=/mytbbeta/de/ --environment=beta --aot true --preserve-symlinks true--app=server --output-path dist/mytbbeta-server/de --locale de --i18n-format xlf --i18n-file src/frontend/locales/messages.de.xlf
scripts.frontendserver-build-prod-de: ng build --base-href=/mytb/de/ --environment=prod --aot true --preserve-symlinks true --app=server --output-path dist/mytb-server/de --locale de --i18n-format xlf --i18n-file src/frontend/locales/messages.de.xlf
scripts.frontendserver-build-and-serve-dev-de: npm run frontendserver-build-dev-de && npm run frontendserver-build-server-dev-de && npm run frontendserver-serve-dev-de
scripts.frontendserver-build-and-serve-beta-de: npm run frontendserver-build-beta-de && npm run frontendserver-build-server-beta-de && npm run frontendserver-serve-beta-de
scripts.frontendserver-build-and-serve-prod-de: npm run frontendserver-build-prod-de && npm run frontendserver-build-server-prod-de && npm run frontendserver-serve-prod-de
scripts.generate-sitemaps: node dist/backend/serverAdmin.js --command generateSitemap config/sitemap-de.json && node dist/backend/serverAdmin.js --command generateSitemap config/sitemap-en.json
scripts.prepare: patch-package && npm run prepare-symlinks && npm run prepare-build && npm run prepare-build-before-copy-overrides-installer && npm run prepare-build-before-copy-overrides-sbin && npm run prepare-build-before-copy-overrides-src && npm run prepare-build-before-copy-overrides-devtools
scripts.prepare-symlinks: symlink-dir src/shared src/backend/shared && symlink-dir src/shared src/frontend/shared && symlink-dir src/shared src/frontendserver/shared
scripts.start: ng serve --app=frontend --watch --aot true --preserve-symlinks true --locale de --i18n-format xlf --i18n-file src/frontend/locales/messages.de.xlf --proxy-config proxy.conf.json
scripts.start-en: ng serve --app=frontend --watch --aot true --preserve-symlinks true --locale en --i18n-format xlf --i18n-file src/frontend/locales/messages.en.xlf --proxy-config proxy.conf.json
scripts.xi18n: ng xi18n --locale de --out-file messages.de.xlf --app=frontend --output-path src/frontend/locales/ --i18n-format xlf --verbose --progress
scripts.xi18n-en: ng xi18n --locale en --out-file messages.en.xlf --app=frontend --output-path src/frontend/locales/ --i18n-format xlf --verbose --progress
